testcase.failure:
Given Grid User goes to Hubcomfy............................................passed Then Grid User verifies that he or she went to the home page................passed And Grid User click the register button.....................................passed And Grid User clicks on the Become a vendor link............................passed When Grid User go to minutesEmail to receive a valid email..................failed And Grid User receive the email from the page they go to....................skipped And Grid The user returns to the hub-comfy page and enters the email in the email box.skipped And Grid User clicks the RE-SEND CODE button................................skipped And Grid The user goes back to minutesEmail to get the code sent to the email address.skipped And Grid User receives the code and returns to Hubcomfy.....................skipped And Grid The user enters the code that comes to the e-mail address entered in the Verification Code box.skipped And Grid User enter a valid password........................................skipped And Grid User enters valid confirm password.................................skipped And Grid User clicks the register button....................................skipped Then Grid The user verifies seeing the text Welcome to Hubcomfy!............skipped And Grid User quits page....................................................skipped
